name: FairfaxCountyFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Listen to this Fairfax County Flash Briefing for timely and actionable news from Fairfax County. By listening, you will hear the latest news from county government, event information such as public hearings and meetings, recreational and cultural events from parks, libraries and other county programs, and daily tidbits that will improve your life and the lives of your friends and family. There's lots to do in Fairfax County. The Fairfax County Flash Briefing makes staying on top of the news that's important to you and your community easier by providing curated county content for you each and every day. Stay in the know about what's happening in Fairfax County with this flash briefing!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
